DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : PLACENTIA ; HERITAGE FESTIVAL WILL BEGIN TONIGHT
DOC.TEXT: The city will celebrate its history with entertainment and family events at the 30th annual Heritage Festival tonight and Saturday . The festivities begin at 7:30 tonight with a Casino Night at the Placentia Round_Table Women ' s Club , 901 N . Bradford Ave.For $ 25 per person or $ 40 per couple , those attending receive $ 200 in gambling scrip to use at blackjack , roulette and craps tables , with proceeds going_to Rotary_Club college scholarships . The festival , themed " Placentia -- The Dream Is Alive , " continues at 7 a.m. Saturday with a pancake breakfast at Kraemer Memorial Park , Chapman and Bradford avenues . The Chamber_of_Commerce will host the event , which begins at 7 a.m. and has a $ 3 admission_charge . The park is also a good vantage_point for the Heritage Parade , which begins at 10 a.m. at Kraemer and Madison avenues and wends its way past the park . At Bradford Park , festival events will be held from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m .
